title: Nativo
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Typical Mexican food restaurant with juice bar. Has a few vegetarian dishes that can be veganize by removing cheese/cream. Juices are served in big 1 litre glasses - could ask for no sugar/honey. Has 3 locations in Playa del Carmen, one in Avenida Juarez on the other side of the highway bridge from the City Centre, and the other 2 almost next to each other on Avenida 30 with Calle 20.
